scenes.action_text: BURLESQUE Written by Steven Antin 2/20/09 TITLE SEQUENCE OVER MUSIC A series of tight CLOSE-UP shots of dancers moving in high energy fast paced sexy choreography. Very provocative. Legs. Arms. Butts. Boas. Sequins. Costumes. High heels. A kaleidoscope of images and colors. END TITLES ON A BLACK SCREEN FADE IN sounds of PEOPLE TAL
